title: Intel’s record-winning 56-core rig sucks as much power as a tumble dryer
description: Reaching new heights in power consumption and performance

description: TechRadar readers have just 1 week to get NordVPN's best price together with some tasty freebies.

title: Mozilla Firefox gets a handy new feature to prevent tracking and email spam
description: Firefox Relay will now be fully integrated with the Firefox browser, making it easier than ever to prevent being spammed.
